Package edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.controller

Controller classes handling user navigation and interaction with APOD media content, a list of APOD records stored in the local database, and a date-time picker.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DateTimePickerFragment.OnChangeListener
    Event handler for positive dismissal of the DateTimePickerFragment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateTimePickerFragment
    Simple date/time picker, implemented as a DialogFragment wrapping a DatePickerDialog or TimePickerDialog (depending on the selected DateTimePickerFragment.Mode).
    HistoryFragment
    Hosts a RecyclerView of Apod instances from the local database, allowing user selection for display in the ImageFragment set by HistoryFragment.setImageFragment(ImageFragment).
    ImageFragment
    Populates a WebView with the image or video URL of the APOD for the currently rselected date.
    NavActivity
    Primary controller class of the NASA APOD client app.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DateTimePickerFragment.Mode
    Enumerates the two possible modes of operation of DateTimePickerFragment.

Package edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.controller Description

Controller classes handling user navigation and interaction with APOD media content, a list of APOD records stored in the local database, and a date-time picker.
